source_objects.description: Learn how to decorate a cake, prepare a gourmet meal, identify different wine varietals and much more.
source_objects.title: Food & Beverage

items.title: Cooking with Spices
items.headline: Learn how to add Bold & Delicious Flavor to Dishes
objectives_summary: Effectively use cooking techniques to create delicious meals using a variety of spices for future meal planning.

items.title: All About Cookies: the soft and indulgent
items.headline: The ultimate cookie baking guide
objectives_summary: Learn to bake the perfect cookie the right way! With seven different cookies and decorations all from scratch.
Learn all the various techniques of preparing and baking cookies.
Learn to make the basic cookies such as chocolate chip and brownies all the way to the more complex crinkle cookie and financier.

items.title: Making Fresh Sausages at Home
items.headline: A Beginner's Guide to Crafting Sausage Like a Pro
objectives_summary: You'll learn what it takes to make excellent fresh sausages at home.

items.title: Moroccan Recipes : How To Cook a Traditional Tajine
items.headline: Learn how to cook a Moroccan tajine recipe step by step using the traditional and healthy way
objectives_summary: Cook a moroccan tajine by the traditionnel way.
Discover the flavors of Morocco.
Cook with the tajine clay pot.

items.title: Cook Paella and Valencian Rice like a Master Chef
items.headline: Learn to cook and perfect your paellas as a master, with the help of one of the best chefs in Valencia
objectives_summary: In this course you will learn to make Paellas the original Valencian way
You will learn the 10 most famous typical rice dishes from Valencia, cradle of the Paella

items.title: Fundamentals of Wine Tasting - Taste Wine like a Sommelier

visible_instructors.name: Ryan
visible_instructors.title: Ryan Vet
visible_instructors.job_title: Entreprenuer, TV Host, Speaker, Author and Sommelier

items.headline: TV Host and Celebrity Sommelier Ryan Vet, takes you through how to taste wine like a professional
objectives_summary: Learn how to taste wine like a professional sommelier
Understand the technical aspects of identifying aroma and palate notes in wine
Discover techniques to be able to blind taste wine

items.title: Indian Vegetarian Cooking for Beginners
items.headline: Most dishes take no more than 30 minutes to make. From Lentil and Vegetarian curries, rice and savoury dishes.
objectives_summary: By the end of the course you will be available to cook a three course Indian Vegetarian Meal, using all traditional ingredients.

items.title: How To Taste Wine - By a Sommelier

visible_instructors.title: Chris Cuyler
visible_instructors.name: Chris
visible_instructors.job_title: Sommelier and Director of Wine Education

items.headline: Learn a structured approach for tasting wine from a sommelier - New Course
objectives_summary: A structured approach to tasting wine
Three main aspects of wine tasting
A vocabulary to help you describe wine

items.title: "How to Make the Best Ramen at Home" by a Japanese Chef
items.headline: Shoyu ramen and Tonkotsu ramen
objectives_summary: How to make ramen soup
How to make ramen noodles
How to make ramen toppings

items.title: How to Make Cupcakes with Delicious Cupcake Recipes

visible_instructors.title: Sweet'n Small
visible_instructors.name: Sweet'n
visible_instructors.job_title: Learn to make quick and delicious desserts!

items.headline: Making Cupcakes has never been Easier. Learn to bake cupcakes for any occasion and apply unique icing techniques!
objectives_summary: Making stunning Vanilla Cupcakes with Vanilla Butter Cream
Master the art of Icing using commonly used Icing Tools
Create Rose, Flower and Lemon Drop Icing

items.title: Indian Cooking - Dinner on the Spice Route (Chicken Vindaloo

visible_instructors.title: Ayesha D'Mello
visible_instructors.name: Ayesha
visible_instructors.job_title: Passionately teaches healthy home style Indian cooking

items.headline: Learn - Spices 101, Chicken Vindaloo, Butternut Squash, Muttar Basmati Pilaf, Kidney Beans Kachumba, Gajar Ka Halwa,Chai
objectives_summary: My classes and recipes reflect my philosophy to cook quick, easy, delicious and healthy Indian meals that anyone can learn and cook in their own kitchen with locally available spices. I take the most difficult and complicated dishes and create ones that are quick and easy to prepare.

items.title: Become a Wine Connoisseur
items.headline: Learn about wine from vine to table from the experts at Palate Press.
objectives_summary: White Wines of the World
Sparkling Wines
How to Taste Wine

items.title: INDYASSA Pastry Course #3 The Perfect Cream Puffs
items.headline: Learn how to bake the perfect cream puffs and different types of cream fillings.
objectives_summary: Become an expert at making the perfect cream puff.
Learn how to make basic choux pastry.
Learn how to bake Choux au craquelin which is crackled cream puff.

items.title: Growing and Preparing Your Own Lacto-Fermented Food

visible_instructors.name: Janet
visible_instructors.title: Janet Luke
visible_instructors.job_title: Urban Sustainable Living Expert and Author

items.headline: Learn how to grow your own nutrient dense and organic vegetables in your garden and turn them into probiotic food.
objectives_summary: Demonstrate how to successfully grow your own vegetables organically in your own garden or containers.
Describe the process of lacto-fermentation
Explain the benefits of including fermented food in your daily diet

items.title: Eat Lite! Eat Right with Linda

visible_instructors.title: Michael Ballard
visible_instructors.name: Michael
visible_instructors.job_title: Learn how to thrive & create more positive outcomes!

items.headline: Learn 3 ways to reduce your fatigue and increase your energy
objectives_summary: Learn food prep ideas to save time
Discover recipes to help us eat lite and eat right
Increase the quality of the food we eat

items.title: Food Decorating: Watermelon Fruit Decorating Arrangement

visible_instructors.title: Tatiana Ambrose
visible_instructors.name: Tatiana
visible_instructors.job_title: Grow your creative thinking, writing & dog business skills

items.headline: Fruit decoration workshop: carving & decorating a watermelon into a peacock arrangement plus a tropical fruit bowl craft
objectives_summary: Use your creativity to create your very own tropical watermelon fruit bowl
Learn how to make a fruit bowl arrangement
Carve and decorate a watermelon
